    • validateFields

      public boolean validateFields(String title, String description, String location, String type)
      Validates appointment data fields using boolean values.
      Parameters:
      title - Appointment title text field validation.
      description - Appointment description text field validation.
      location - Appointment location text field validation.
      type - Appointment type text field validation.
      Returns:
      Returns true if fields are valid, otherwise returns false
